blast burn.desc: hot. very very hot. dante would be proud.

water gun.desc: The target is blasted with a forceful shot of water.

bubble beam.desc: A spray of bubbles is forcefully ejected at the target.

thunderbolt.desc: A strong electric blast crashes down on the target.

defense curl.desc: The user curls up to conceal weak spots and raise its Defense stat.

agility.desc: The user relaxes and lightens its body to move faster. This sharply raises the Speed stat.

growl.desc: The user growls in an endearing way, making the foe less wary. The target's Attack stat is lowered.

rest.desc: The user goes to sleep for two turns. This fully restores the user's HP and heals any status conditions.

thunder wave.desc: The user launches a weak jolt of electricity that paralyzes the target.

crunch.desc: The user crunches up the target with sharp fangs. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

crabhammer.desc: The target is hammered with a large pincer.

absorb.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

mega drain.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target.

giga drain.desc: A nutrient-draining attack. The user's HP is restored by half the damage taken by the target

hydro pump.desc: The target is blasted by a huge volume of water launched under great pressure.

sing.desc: A soothing lullaby is sung in a calming voice that puts the target into a deep slumber.

pound.desc: The target is physically pounded with a long tail, a foreleg, or the like.

double slap.desc: The target is slapped repeatedly, back and forth, two to five times in a row.

body slam.desc: The user drops onto the target with its full body weight. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

double-edge.desc: A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

wing attack.desc: A reckless, life-risking tackle in which the user rushes the target. This also damages the user quite a lot.

string shot.desc: Opposing Pok√©mon are bound with silk blown from the user's mouth that harshly lowers the Speed stat.

harden.desc: The user stiffens all the muscles in its body to raise its Defense stat.

poison powder.desc: The user scatters a cloud of poisonous dust that poisons the target.

stun spore.desc: The user scatters a cloud of numbing powder that paralyzes the target.

sleep powder.desc: The user scatters a big cloud of sleep-inducing dust around the target.

psybeam.desc: The target is attacked with a peculiar ray. This may also leave the target confused.

air slash.desc: The user attacks with a blade of air that slices even the sky. This may also make the target flinch.

bug buzz.desc: The user generates a damaging sound wave by vibration. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

rock throw.desc: The user picks up and throws a small rock at the target to attack.

rock slide.desc: Large boulders are hurled at opposing Pok√©mon to inflict damage. This may also make the opposing Pok√©mon flinch.

dark pulse.desc: The user releases a horrible aura imbued with dark thoughts. This may also make the target flinch.

earthquake.desc: The user sets off an earthquake that strikes every Pok√©mon around it.

stone edge.desc: The user stabs the target from below with sharpened stones.

metal claw.desc: The target is raked with steel claws. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

rock smash.desc: The user attacks with a punch. This may also lower the target's Defense stat.

swords dance.desc: A frenetic dance to uplift the fighting spirit. This sharply raises the user's Attack stat.

force palm.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

aura sphere.desc: The user lets loose a blast of aura power from deep within its body at the target. This attack never misses.

meteor mash.desc: The target is hit with a hard punch fired like a meteor. This may also raise the user's Attack stat.

dragon pulse.desc: The target is attacked with a shock wave generated by the user's gaping mouth.

close combat.desc: The user fights the target up close without guarding itself. This also lowers the user's Defense and Sp. Def stats.

leer.desc: The user gives opposing Pok√©mon an intimidating leer that lowers the Defense stat.

low sweep.desc: The user makes a swift attack on the target's legs, which lowers the target's Speed stat.

scary face.desc: The user frightens the target with a scary face to harshly lower its Speed stat.

strength.desc: The target is slugged with a punch thrown at maximum power.

dual chop.desc: The user attacks its target by hitting it with brutal strikes.

bulk up.desc: The user tenses its muscles to bulk up its body, raising both its Attack and Defense stats.

dynamic punch.desc: The user punches the target with full, concentrated power. This confuses the target if it hits.

cross chop.desc: The user delivers a double chop with its forearms crossed.

astonish.desc: The user attacks the target while shouting in a startling fashion. This may also make the target flinch

twister.desc: The user whips up a vicious tornado to tear at opposing Pok√©mon. This may also make them flinch.

acid spray.desc: The user spits fluid that works to melt the target. This harshly lowers the target's Sp. Def stat

dragon breath.desc: The user exhales a mighty gust that inflicts damage. This may also leave the target with paralysis.

dragon dance.desc: The user vigorously performs a mystic, powerful dance that raises its Attack and Speed stats.

grav apple.desc: The user inflicts damage by dropping an apple from high above. This also lowers the target's Defense stat.

iron defense.desc: The user hardens its body's surface like iron, sharply raising its Defense stat.

iron head.desc: The user slams the target with its steel-hard head. This may also make the target flinch.

geomancy.desc: The user absorbs energy and sharply raises its Sp. Atk, Sp. Def, and Speed stats.

moonblast.desc: Borrowing the power of the moon, the user attacks the target. This may also lower the target's Sp. Atk stat.

dragon rush.desc: The user tackles the target while exhibiting overwhelming menace. This may also make the target flinch.

outrage.desc: The user rampages and attacks. The user becomes confused.

endeavor.desc: This attack move cuts down the target's HP to equal the user's HP.

take down.desc: A reckless, full-body charge attack for slamming into the target. This also damages the user a little.

aerial ace.desc: The user confounds the target with speed, then slashes. This attack never misses.

brave bird.desc: The user tucks in its wings and charges from a low altitude. This also damages the user quite a lot.

final gambit.desc: The user risks everything to attack its target. The user faints but does damage equal to its HP.

tail whip.desc: The user wags its tail cutely, making opposing Pok√©mon less wary and lowering their Defense stat.

hyper fang.desc: The user bites hard on the target with its sharp front fangs. This may also make the target flinch.

earth power.desc: The user makes the ground under the target erupt with power. This may also lower the target's Sp. Def stat.

lava plume.desc: The user torches everything around it in an inferno of scarlet flames. This may also leave those it hits with a burn.

amnesia.desc: The user temporarily empties its mind to forget its concerns. This sharply raises the user's Sp. Def stat.

swagger.desc: The user enrages and confuses the target. However, this also sharply raises the target's Attack stat

stomp.desc: The target is stomped with a big foot. This may also make the target flinch.

fire fang.desc: The user bites with flame-cloaked fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it with a burn.

hyper voice.desc: The user lets loose a horribly echoing shout with the power to inflict damage

recover.desc: Restoring its own cells, the user restores its own HP by half of its max HP.

judgement.desc: The user releases countless shots of light at the target.

cosmic power.desc: The user absorbs a mystical power from space to raise its Defense and Sp. Def stats.

growth.desc: The user's body grows all at once, raising the Attack and Sp. Atk stats.

razor leaf.desc: Sharp-edged leaves are launched to slash at opposing Pok√©mon. Critical hits land more easily

seed bomb.desc: The user slams a barrage of hard-shelled seeds down on the target from above.

synthesis.desc: The user restores half of its own HP

solar beam.desc: the user gathers light and blasts a bundled beam at the target in the same turn.

smokescreen.desc: The user releases an obscuring cloud of smoke or ink. This lowers the target's accuracy.

slash.desc: The target is attacked with a slash of claws or blades.

inferno.desc: The user attacks by engulfing the target in an intense fire. This leaves the target with a burn.

flare blitz.desc: The user cloaks itself in fire and charges the target. This also damages the user quite a lot. This attack may leave the target with a burn.

rapid spin.desc: The user makes a spin attack. This also raises the user's Speed stat.

withdraw.desc: The user withdraws its body into its hard shell, raising its Defense stat.

water pulse.desc: The user attacks the target with a pulsing blast of water. This may also confuse the target.

aqua tail.desc: The user attacks by swinging its tail as if it were a vicious wave in a raging storm

shell smash.desc: The user breaks its shell, which lowers Defense and Sp. Def stats but sharply raises its Attack, Sp. Atk, and Speed stats.

will-o-wisp.desc: The user shoots a sinister flame at the target to inflict a burn.

confuse ray.desc: The target is exposed to a sinister ray that triggers confusion.

poison sting.desc: The user stabs the target with a poisonous stinger. This may also poison the target.

dragon ascent.desc: After soaring upward, the user attacks its target by dropping out of the sky at high speeds, although it lowers its own Defense and Sp. Def in the process.

blizzard.desc: A howling blizzard is summoned to strike opposing Pok√©mon. This may also leave the opposing Pok√©mon frozen.

fake out.desc: This attack hits first and makes the target flinch. It only works the first turn each time the user enters battle.

ice fang.desc: The user bites with cold-infused fangs. This may also make the target flinch or leave it frozen.
